description: Yuu and company are on a break during their tour, and they go hiking in the woods. They get lost on their hike and decide to take a break, which is when they find a Western-style mansion. Yuu feels like someone is watching them as soon as she goes inside. Kidokoro tells the story of a banshee who searches for boys who resemble her lost love and takes them to another dimension. But it seems like the banshee is going after Toshio...
